Bash(# Modify the combined file to have a simpler test
cat tests/unit/test_ticket_sidebar_filtering.py > /tmp/test_combined2.py
cat >> /tmp/test_combined2.py << 'PYEOF'


@pytest.mark.skipif\(not _can_import_pyqt6\(\), reason="PyQt6 not available"\)
class TestJiraBtnSimple:
    def test_jira_button_attr\(self\):
        _ensure_qapp\(\)
        from levelup.gui.ticket_sidebar import TicketSidebarWidget
        widget = TicketSidebarWidget\(\)
        assert hasattr\(widget, '_jira_btn'\)
PYEOF
cp /tmp/test_combined2.py tests/unit/test_gui_jira_copy_test.py
.venv/Scripts/python.exe -m pytest tests/unit/test_gui_jira_copy_test.py::TestJiraBtnSimple -v 2>&1)
